thread.title: This Woman Was Fired From Her New Job For a Very ‘Zoolander’-like Reason
thread.title_full: This Woman Was Fired From Her New Job For a Very ‘Zoolander’-like Reason

author: Abby Heugel
title: This Woman Was Fired From Her New Job For a Very ‘Zoolander’-like Reason
text:
Over 3 million people just like you 'Like' us » Like it? Share it! 481 Shares Twenty-four-year-old Emma Hulse says she was fired from her freelance TV production job for — wait for it — being too good-looking. via: Instagram She was only five minutes into her eight-hour shift when a manager told her, "You should be on a catwalk" and then asked for her phone number. Giphy 
According to the London Evening Standard , the company that hired her, UNIT TV, accepted the incident happened and have since dismissed the employee who was allegedly involved. “We were supposed to finish at 6 PM and I got there for [sic] 9.30 AM and when I got there this other runner started explaining to me what I should do," she said. via: Instagram 
“Then they send me on a run. Then my agent text me that I’m no longer required. I got there and spoke to the line manager and he asked me, ‘Are you a model? Are you not doing catwalks, why are you not at the front of house?’” “I was wearing a lipstick but from my perspective I was not inappropriate," she continued. "I was wearing a shirt and trousers. I really didn’t think I looked inappropriate." via: Instagram 
“Then he took my number, he suggested we go for a drink,” she added. “I was quite disappointed to be sent home. I didn’t really know what to do.” 22 Words Rocks ...AND GETS ALL UP IN YOUR FACEBOOK More posts in #Bizarre
